input:
Algne HTML-tootekirjeldus (sh k√µik pildid) on all. Kirjuta see ja varasemates sammudes kogutud konteksti p√µhjal √ºmber loomulikuks eestikeelseks tootekirjelduseks, s√§ilitades k√µik algsed -elemendid (sama src) ja j√§rgides √ºlaltoodud struktuuri. ORIGINAALNE_HTML_KIRJELDUS:

Natural drying with fresh air

Natural drying with fresh air Our 300 AirDry Dishwasher finishes each cycle with a breath of fresh air, performing 3x better than closed-door systems. The door opens automatically during the drying phase using fresh air to get plates and cutlery completely dry.

3x better drying with AirDry

3x better drying with AirDry The new AirDry technology uses natural airflow to finish drying, for up to 3x better performance compared to closed-door systems. The door opens 10 cm towards the end of the cycle, letting air circulate for superb drying results.

Water touches every corner, with the Dual Spray Arms

Water touches every corner, with the Dual Spray Arms Every glass, dish and plate is covered by the dishwasher's two rotating spray arms. The sprinklers make sure water gets into every corner, so your dishes come out sparkling. On both the upper and lower basket.

Quick and efficient

Quick and efficient Your new time saver. When you have a light load, our 30-minute quick wash programme offers the perfect solution. And all without compromising on results. For the perfect washing result - fast.

Easy installation, PerfectFit

Easy installation, PerfectFit With PerfectFit Sliding Hinges, it‚Äôs never been easier to install your new dishwasher. The hinges accommodate all niche machine heights and even remove the need to cut the plinth. You can be confident that your machine will fit into your kitchen perfectly.

Rinse and hold ‚Äì pre-washing for freshness

Rinse and hold ‚Äì pre-washing for freshness If it takes you a few days to fill up the dishwasher, the rinse and hold programme will prevent the build-up of odours in the meantime. Water jets remove food remnants from plates and glassware, making sure the kitchen stays fresh.
